r.s: An effective,fast,stable log extension for PHP.
r.d: An effective,fast,stable log extension for PHP. - In the PHP project, for convenient record log. - The default log directory and module configuration. - Specify the log directory and get the current configuration. - Analysis of early warning framework preliminary. - Buffer debug efficient log buffer, convenient. - With PSR-3 Logger interface. - Error and exception automatic logging. - Support appender with File,TCP,UDP. - Send to Rsyslog(TCP/UDP) with RFC5424. - Support RequestId differentiated requests. - Support for log template customizations.
r.n: - Fixed issue #249 add unit test and fixed setLogger bug. - Fixed build error with mac osx.
